title: rowan-n.github.io
text:
This is a website I created for my Data Science class. It contains a page about me, as well as a dropdown of a few tidyverse data sets I’ve analysed.
This website will be expanded on over the course of the semester!
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About
text:
Rowan Norenberg is a linguistics, data science, and French student. When they’re not in class or studying, they perform in choir and run D&D campaigns for their friends.


Pomona College | Claremont, CA B.A. in Linguistics | Sept 2023 - June 2027

title: Data Viz
text: Here’s where you describe your plots…

title: Tidy Tuesday - D&D Monsters
text: This is a plot I made comparing the different types of D&D monsters with their total hit points and their strength score / modifier.

title: Tidy Tuesday - D&D Spells
text:
Help 2

#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

spells <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2024/2024-12-17/spells.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)


ggplot(spells, aes(x = school, y = level, color = range)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = "School of Magic",
    y = "Range of Spell",
    title = "D&D Spell Range by School",
  )
